General.Name: Rumere Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Rumere Co.,Ltd. engages in the online apparel retail business in China. It is involved in planning and design, supply chain management, and sales of apparel and other products. The company offers professional and casual styles of women's and men's clothing, home textiles, and accessories. It offers products under the Rongmei RUMERE brand. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Changshu, China.

1.Name: Mr. Qingtao  Yu
1.Title: Deputy GM, Director, CFO & Board Sec.
